scripts.dev: concurrently -n frontend,backend -c cyan,magenta "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate 2>/dev/null || true && uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8000
scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup: cp .env.example .env && npm run install:all && cd backend && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
